properties.address: A F C Totton, Southampton, Hampshire SO40 2RW
properties.description: The STAG room has a bar, audio visual equipment, and ample seating and tables. The Snows Stadium continues to be developed, turning it into a multipurpose facility to serve the local community and in addition our catering, conference, and events facilities. The facilities at AFC Totton have successfully been used in the past by the NHS as a COVID vaccination centre and is regularly used as a training centre by a range of businesses. Breakfast and brunch is served in the Stag bar from 8.30 'til noon, a perfect place to drop into to catch up with friends.
properties.title: AFC Totton Football Club
